BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-Foldseek

BundleInfo.Synopsis: Search for proteins with similar folds using Foldseek web service
BundleInfo.Description: Search for proteins with similar folds using Foldseek web service

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: Command :: foldseek :: Structure Comparison :: Search PDB or AlphaFold databases for protein structures matching the fold of a specified structure
Tool :: Foldseek :: Structure Analysis :: Search PDB or AlphaFold databases for protein structures matching the fold of a specified structure
